text: Johanne Samueline Pedersen (15 March 1887 - 16 September 1961) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. She was born in Innvik. She was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Hedmark in 1945, and was re-elected on one occasion. She had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1937-1945\. Pedersen was a member of Brandval municipality council from 1934 to 1940 and 1945 to 1951. ==References== * Category:1887 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Women members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian women politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Johanne Samueline Pedersen
